avalancheActivity.comment: A small slab was reported in Bláfjöll on February 22nd along with small sloughs and cornice fall.
avalancheActivity.highlights: Thawing has affected the snowpack up to the mountain tops, and a significant amount of snow has melted. The snowpack is now uniform and will strengthen when it freezes again night to Tuesday. Small wind slabs could form in W-directions and deposit snow in depressions and gullies.

snowpackStructure.highlights: A significant amount of snow has melted, during thaw on Sunday and Monday. When it freezes again on Tuesday night, we can expect the snowpack to strengthen. Snowing during westerlies may cause wind slab formation in valleys and gullies facing the east on Tuesday. Large avalanches are not expected due to this.

travelAdvisory.comment: A significant amount of snow has melted into crust on Monday throughout the country, and thawing has reached up to the mountain tops in many areas. Wind slabs could form in north-facing slopes during the Tuesday night snowfall and on Tuesday morning in North and East parts. Weaknesses in the upper snowpack have likely disappeared due to the thaw, but deeper weaknesses higher in the mountains could still be present in the North part of the country.
travelAdvisory.highlights: A significant amount of snow has melted during thaw throughout the country, and has reached up to the mountain tops in many areas. Wind slabs form on N-aspects during snow through Tuesday.

weatherForecast.highlights: Hægari vindur og heldur úrkomumeira mánudagskvöld. Gengur vestan 5-10 með skúrum eða slydduél og kólnandi veðri aðfaranótt þriðjudags. Frystir þriðjudagskvöld.

avalancheActivity.comment: A few wet avalanches occurred during the thaw on Monday. A few avalanches occurred last week.
avalancheActivity.highlights: Snowfall on Tuesday during NE-winds could cause windslabs on SW-aspects.

snowpackStructure.highlights: The thaw on Monday reached to high elevations. Snowfall is predicted on Tuesday during strong NE-winds so windslabs could form on SW-aspects. The underlying snowpack is most likely becoming rather stable.

travelAdvisory.comment: A significant amount of snow has melted into crust on Monday throughout the country, and thawing has reached up to the mountain tops in many areas. Wind slabs could form in north-facing slopes during the Tuesday night snowfall and on Tuesday morning in North and East parts. Weaknesses in the upper snowpack have likely disappeared due to the thaw, but deeper weaknesses higher in the mountains could still be present in the North part of the country.
travelAdvisory.highlights: A significant amount of snow has melted during thaw throughout the country, and has reached up to the mountain tops in many areas. Wind slabs form on N-aspects during snow through Tuesday.

weatherForecast.highlights: Snýst í NA 8-15 m/s með snjókomu og kólnandi veðri á þriðjudag. Fremur hægur vindur og úrkomulítið á miðvikudag en aftur NA-átt á fimmtudag og líkur á snjókomu. Á föstudag er útlit fyrir norðaustlæga átt.

avalancheActivity.comment: Several large avalanches have been reported around Dalvík and Ólafsfjörður, that released during N-directions and snow before the weekend.
avalancheActivity.highlights: The thaw on Monday has affected the snowpack up to the mountaintops, but it is expected to firm up and strengthen as it cools again on Tuesday. Northwest wind on Tuesday night will form wind slabs on south- and east-facing slopes.

snowpackStructure.highlights: The thaw on Monday has affected the snowpack up to the mountain tops, but it is expected to firm up and strengthen as it cools again on Tuesday. Northwest wind on Tuesday night forms wind slabs on south- and east-facing slopes. Weaknesses higher up in the snowpack likely subsided during the warm spell, but deeper weaknesses near the older firn are likely still presen. Stability tests showed fractures at moderate to high stress on that layer. Compression tests showed that the layer breaks easily, and faceted crystals are still present. However, significant stress or warming is likely needed for an avalanche to occur on that layer, as the upper layers will likely stiffen further as the temperatures cool down this week.

travelAdvisory.comment: A significant amount of snow has melted into crust on Monday throughout the country, and thawing has reached up to the mountain tops in many areas. Wind slabs could form in north-facing slopes during the Tuesday night snowfall and on Tuesday morning in North and East parts. Weaknesses in the upper snowpack have likely disappeared due to the thaw, but deeper weaknesses higher in the mountains could still be present in the North part of the country.
travelAdvisory.highlights: A significant amount of snow has melted during thaw throughout the country, and has reached up to the mountain tops in many areas. Wind slabs form on N-aspects during snow through Tuesday.

weatherForecast.highlights: Lægir með rigningu mánudagskvöld, en kólnar og fer að snjóa yfir nótt. Norðvestan 8-13, él og frost 2 til 6 stig á þriðjudag.

avalancheActivity.comment: A skier triggered a slab avalanche of size 2 in Stafdalur on Feb 25th. Older avalanches can be found in Norfjörður and Fagridalur.
avalancheActivity.highlights: Windslabs are present. It will snow on Tuesday during strong W/NW gale with further windslab formation, especially on S-E aspects.

snowpackStructure.highlights: Layered windslabs are present on most aspects after variable winds. The bond between layers in the windslabs could be unstable. It will snow on Tuesday during W/NW winds which will most likely form windslabs on S-E aspects.

travelAdvisory.comment: A significant amount of snow has melted into crust on Monday throughout the country, and thawing has reached up to the mountain tops in many areas. Wind slabs could form in north-facing slopes during the Tuesday night snowfall and on Tuesday morning in North and East parts. Weaknesses in the upper snowpack have likely disappeared due to the thaw, but deeper weaknesses higher in the mountains could still be present in the North part of the country.
travelAdvisory.highlights: A significant amount of snow has melted during thaw throughout the country, and has reached up to the mountain tops in many areas. Wind slabs form on N-aspects during snow through Tuesday.

weatherForecast.highlights: V/NV 15-23 m/s og snjókoma á þriðjudag. Snjókoma í hægum austlægum áttum seint á miðvikudag og snýst í hvassa NA-læga átt á fimmtudag.
